text: Maccabaeus, perceiving the presence of the 15:21 Gr. multitudes. troops, and the various weapons with which they were equipped, and the savageness of the 15:21 Gr. animals. elephants, holding up his hands to heaven called upon the Lord who works wonders, knowing that success comes not by weapons, but that, according to how the Lord judges, he gains the victory for those who are worthy.
